price: Сўнгра шоядки, шукр қилсангизлар деб, ўлганингиздан кейин тирилтирдик.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
